title: (Mon Early Bird) Bobby on Why Guys Have A Hard Time Expressing Feelings + Morgan2 Reviews ‘Karate Kid’ After Watching for the First Time
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Bobby on Why Guys Have A Hard Time Expressing Feelings + Morgan2 Reviews ‘Karate Kid’ After Watching for the First Time
description:
Bobby talks about why it’s hard for guys to show their feelings and uses the example of Scuba Steve being awkward giving him a birthday gift in the building’s garage. Morgan reviews the Karate Kid which was given to her as homework because she’s never seen it before. And Lunchbox tries to go viral.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
